description: This file is the entry point for a React web application. It initializes the app by rendering the main App component into the DOM element with id 'root', using React 18's createRoot API, and wraps the app in React.StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render React components into a DOM element, as per React 18+ API.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React element tree into the created root.
